channel.title: PLEASE HELP, Can NO LONGER HOST A SERVER?
channel.description:
this is the 2nd time ive posted this casue no replys. hey everyone first off ima start with this: i have a belkin g + mimo router and a bellsouth.net modem
ive portfowarded on the router useing the virtual servers tool portfowarded port 6161 on TCP and UDP, same thing on the modem,
now since 2 weeks ago i can no longer host on the same port and server and client
server: i checked server.java and server.ini i made sure that they were on port 6161 so i compiled and ran wiht utorrent overtopping.
i went to canyouseeme.org port check tool and typed in the port.
every time its ether connection refused or timeout. i shut down all my firewalls router, computer and modem and still same thing.
i made sure on client that the client.java server spot was linked. it had the gui.server in it. so it linked over to gui.java i went in there and changed the ip. still nothing. (in client i made sure i changed 43594 to 6161)
so does anyone have any help on why i can no longer host a server? port fowarded tcp/udp in windows firewall 2.

item.title: PLEASE HELP, Can NO LONGER HOST A SERVER?
item.dc:creator: @gooasco gooasco
item.description:
@gooasco wrote:

this is the 2nd time ive posted this casue no replys.
hey everyone first off ima start with this: i have a belkin g + mimo router and a bellsouth.net modem

ive portfowarded on the router useing the virtual servers tool
portfowarded port 6161 on TCP and UDP, same thing on the modem,

now since 2 weeks ago i can no longer host on the same port and server and client

server:
i checked server.java and server.ini
i made sure that they were on port 6161 so i compiled and ran wiht utorrent overtopping.

i went to canyouseeme.org port check tool and typed in the port.

every time its ether connection refused or timeout.
i shut down all my firewalls
router, computer and modem
and still same thing.

i made sure on client that the client.java server spot was linked. it had the gui.server in it. so it linked over to gui.java
i went in there and changed the ip.
still nothing.
(in client i made sure i changed 43594 to 6161)

so does anyone have any help on why i can no longer host a server?
port fowarded tcp/udp in windows firewall 2.
